articles.title: Machine Learning vs. Deep Learning: What's the Difference?
articles.description: Artificial intelligence technology is undergirded by two intertwined forms of automation.
articles.content: Artificial intelligence is everywhere these days, but the fundamentals of how this influential new technology works can be confusing. Two of the most important fields in AI development are “machine learning” and its sub-field, “deep learning.” Here’s... [6776 chars]

articles.title: Why artificial general intelligence lies beyond deep learning
articles.description: Many believe deep learning will continue to advance and play a crucial role in achieving AGI — but it does have its limitations.
articles.content:
Sam Altman’s recent employment saga and speculation about OpenAI’s groundbreaking Q* model have renewed public interest in the possibilities and risks of artificial general intelligence (AGI).
AGI could learn and execute intellectual tasks comparably... [6111 chars]

articles.title: AI is easy to describe, challenging to do: Cerebras Systems’ CEO Andrew Feldman
articles.description: Cerebras Systems is an American artificial intelligence company that builds computer systems for complex artificial intelligence deep learning applications.
articles.content:
Bengaluru: Training models is difficult and it’s hard for everyone in the industry, said Andrew Feldman, CEO of US-based artificial intelligence company Cerebras Systems, at the Mint Digital Innovation Summit 2024 on Friday.

articles.title: New AI techniques improve tumor detection in PET and CT scans
articles.description: Artificial intelligence has the potential to improve the analysis of medical image data. For example, algorithms based on deep learning can determine the location and size of tumors.

articles.title: Humanoid robot masters the art of sketching through deep learning
articles.description: There is a new collaboration of artificial intelligence and robotics as researchers reveal a humanoid robot's real-time sketching abilities.
